txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Broken sword sheaths from the brigands on the outskirts of the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the items to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.
'These are large enough to make fancy belts for us hobbit-folk. Maybe that is why the Bounders wanted these.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'I heard that there are goblins north of Overhill and brigands down near the Marish.'
Mathom Society Task: Broken Sword Sheaths
Hal Hornblower wants broken sword sheaths. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the broken sword sheaths to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire broken sword sheaths for the Bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Broken sword sheaths from the brigands on the outskirts of the Shire.
